code: import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import ExpenseForm from'./components/ExpenseForm';import ExpenseList from'./components/ExpenseList';import SummaryChart from'./components/SummaryChart';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[expenses,setExpenses]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const savedExpenses=localStorage.getItem('expenses');if(savedExpenses){try{const parsedExpenses=JSON.parse(savedExpenses);if(Array.isArray(parsedExpenses)){setExpenses(parsedExpenses);}}catch(error){console.error('Failed to parse expenses from localStorage',error);}}},[]);useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem('expenses',JSON.stringify(expenses));},[expenses]);const addExpense=newExpense=>{setExpenses(prevExpenses=>[...prevExpenses,newExpense]);};const deleteExpense=id=>{setExpenses(prevExpenses=>prevExpenses.filter(expense=>expense.id!==id));};const clearAllExpenses=()=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete ALL expenses?')){setExpenses([]);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Expense Tracker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseForm,{onAddExpense:addExpense}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExpenseList,{expenses:expenses,onDelete:deleteExpense,onClearAll:clearAllExpenses})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"right-panel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SummaryChart,{expenses:expenses})})]})]});}export default App;
